node.text:
Repost from @tex369champ 

While in high school, I had 8-10 lung infections, heart infection at 22, severe neuropathy in both feet at 24, mercury poisoning and hormone issues at 27, at 29 I finally got diagnosed with “LYME Disease”. 

I trusted my functional medicine doctor’s advice and followed an antibiotics regiment for 8 months.  This involved being BOMBED with 1500mg every day, dry heaving daily, even peeing on myself from being so weak, and I just couldn’t do it anymore. 

Then, from the ages of 30-32, I struggled for answers. I was willing to do whatever it took to regain my health and live my life again. 

One decision was going to China with my father in hopes for receiving some answers from Chinese medicine doctors. 

When that didn’t suffice, I made my next move - definitely the MOST drastic and taxing for my body - at 33, I traveled to a clinic in Germany, known for their extremely risky Hail Mary treatment. It’s a hyperthermia treatment where they put you under anesthesia twice for 6 hours, all the while, heating your whole body to 106.8-107 degrees Fahrenheit.  While under, they are concurrently pumping you with more antibiotics. It is so risky, in fact, that at 107.1/2 degrees Fahrenheit, it’s stated that there are serious and legitimate risks of brain failure. 

So, I got fried in Germany and I came back absolutely destroyed - in fact, most of us did. After that procedure, I wasn’t able to stand up at all, not even to shower, or cut a stalk of celery at the sink.  If you were to put a gun to my head and told me to stand up for 5-10 min, you would have shot me. That is how bad it was and how completely wrecked my body had become. 

I struggled on for 11 more months before finding @medicalmedium in Dec of 2019, I began to devoutly follow MM protocol(food and supps). When Cleanse to Heal came out with the advanced version of the 369 and explicitly stated that back to backing rounds was ok, I went right for it.

Life is not a play, there are no rehearsals, you get one shot.

#medicalmedium

node.text:
People already have enough poisons and toxins inside their liver, brain and bodies. We don’t know when to stop, we take in more and more everyday. We become sheeple and pattle, a herd being slowly driven to our 3rd, 4th, 5th neurologist, because we be become sick and our bodies say, no more please. 

The problem is we don’t know what’s toxic, so we end up intoxicating ourselves day in and day out, believing we’re living healthy. 

Perfumes, colognes, scented candles, air fresheners, scented laundry detergents, scented fabric softeners, hair care products, aftershaves, body lotions & more are filled with chemicals agents, chemical poisons, hidden under the labels “fragrance” “perfume” “parfume” “naturally derived scents” and more… it’s the secret fragrance war on our bodies. 

If you didn’t catch video Part 1, go watch it.

#medicalmedium

node.text:
These days everyone is so worried about what they are putting in their bodies. In the grocery store people are reading the ingredient lists on packages and bottles, people want clean food, farm to table, and freshly caught or harvested foods. 

Everyone seems to be an expert on healthy eating and healthy living. Meanwhile, all these experts are drowning themselves in perfume, cologne, air fresheners, scented laundry detergents, fabric softeners, scented hair products, so called naturally derived chemical scents, while they’re burning their scented candles. 

At the same time people are saturating themselves with these chemical based products, they don’t have a clue on how many patented, poisonous, toxic chemical agents they are exposing themselves to. 

Have you ever wondered what ingredients are in perfume and cologne? Have you ever wondered what ingredients are in fragrance?

Read more about how toxic fragrances are in the New York Times Best-Selling book Cleanse To Heal

Also check out Medical Medium Podcast Episode: Air Fresheners, Scented Candles, Colognes, & Perfumes 

#medicalmedium

node.title: Perfumes, Colognes, Scented Candles, & Air Fresheners Part 1

node.text:
No one is lacking fat in the diet as there is fat in almost every food including dairy, eggs, cheese, meats, fruits, vegetables, grains and beans. No one is deficient of omegas in the brain, but everyone is lacking Glucose to the brain. 

People are not getting enough Glucose and because of the lack of Glucose to the brain, their brains start to shrink as the years go by and they age.  

Toxic Heavy Metal exposure is on the rise like never before. Contamination from seafood, sushi, fish oil, aluminum foil, canned tuna, house hold cleaning supply’s, insecticides, recreational drugs, medications, perfume, cologne, air fresheners, scented candles, fabric softeners, and  much much more. 

The more Fats in the diet, the more corrosion occurs to the Toxic Heavy Metals inside the brain. They interact with the electricity in your shrinking brain and set the stage for Depression, Anxiety, Bipolar, Mania, OCD, Memory Loss, Alzheimers, unexplained outbursts, crying, Anger and chronic Sadness. And then we are on lots of prescription meds day in and day out. 

Too much Fat and not enough of the good stuff your brain needs, lowering the Fats in your diet is a great start to preventing chronic illness.

#medicalmedium

node.text:
READ THIS IF YOU THINK THE BRAIN IS MOSTLY MADE OF FAT. 

The theory that our brain is mostly made  up of fat is misinformation 

The cadaver brains used to estimate how much fat is in the human brain were from people who were obese  and on a Standard American Diet. The cadaver brains had built up fat deposits in and all around the brain, this increased the percentage of fat raising percentages to 20 to 30 percent higher than a healthy brain in a non obese individual.

This is similar to animals that are caged up or not free range at industrial farms being fed GMO soy, corn, and even pigs or chickens blood. The organs including the brain becomes riddled in fat that shouldn’t be there. 

This is much different then wild game or grass fed beef or uncaged free range animals which have a lower percentage of fat in organs and the brain. 

A healthy human brain contains less than 10 percent fat. 

Our brain runs on glucose and is mostly comprised of stored Glycogen, in other words, Sugar.

If our brain is completely without glucose for more than 5 seconds, it starts to die. 

#medicalmedium

node.text:
We are being taught to Fat Ourselves to Death.

We are being told that we need fat and to choose healthy fats. 

Today’s diets are mostly Fat based, and it’s guaranteeing sickness to worsen over time for someone who already has chronic illness and even someone who isn’t sick with a condition or symptom yet. 

People think only unhealthy fats from fried foods, fast foods, take out foods cause cardiovascular conditions but in reality it’s all fats when eaten excessively that cause cardiovascular conditions. 

Even healthy fats build up in the arteries, veins, blood vessels and heart throughout the years. These fats are toxin soluble. Toxin Soluble means all manners of poisonous toxic chemicals in your food, environment, water, and air absorb into the fat and become plaque that clings to the walls of your heart. 

This happens regardless of you adopting an animal based diet or a plant based diet. These diets still have many harmful problems in common and one of the problems is that both the Plant Based and Animal Based Diet belief systems are teaching everyone to saturate their diet in fat. Chicken, Beef, Lamb, Pork, Nuts, Seeds, coconut oil, olive oil, Avocado, Nut butters, Milk, Butter, Cheese, Eggs, Fish, other oils, Nut milks, Soy milks and more. 

Chronic illness is on the rise more than ever before in our history and eating healthy high fat diets isn’t stoping it.

node.text:
Depersonalization is rampant in today’s trying times, it’s behind so many emotional and mental struggles. Toxic Heavy Metals and chemical poisons found in fragrances, scented candles, air fresheners, laundry detergents, fabric softeners, dryer sheets, cologne, perfume, carpet chemicals, pharmaceuticals, mosquito spray, bug spray, and pesticides that are entering our bodies on a daily basis are greatly responsible 

Are you feeling like you are observing yourself from outside of your body and not from the inside? Feeling like you are in a bubble, like things around you aren’t real. Or feeling
like you are in a bubble cut off from outside world? 

Many people feel so disconnected from themselves and feel numb, not hearing what others are saying to them or feeling so displaced and even isolated while around others. 
 
Depersonalization can be a sadness we can’t put our finger on that sits inside us making us doubt ourselves and our purpose. So many struggle with confidence and feel confused. 

We can break free from depersonalization and empower ourselves and learn how to heal 

For more info check out the New York Times Bestselling book Cleanse to Heal

#medicalmedium

node.text:
Tattoos which require Tattoo Ink are high up on the list for containing Toxic Heavy Metals. 
There is no animal cruelty free vegan ink that doesn’t contain Metals, all the inks do. If you’re told different, your being mislead.

Metals in the Tattoo ink is how the design shines thru the skin, the light reflects off of the Metals inside the ink. This is what gives the Tattoo the visual pop when someone gets a fresh Tattoo. The Tattoo fades over the years because the Metals leech out of the ink and into the blood stream as if it was a Toxic Heavy Metal time capsule.

If you are someone who has a Tattoo, keep in mind it’s not about removing the Tattoo, instead it’s about using protocols to stop the Metals from traveling to the brain over the years causing medical conditions that have been identified by Medical Medium information. Symptoms  and conditions that Toxic Heavy Metals cause.

We can run and we can run but we can’t hide. 

Toxic Heavy Metals are everywhere. We can’t avoid most exposures but we can be proactive in avoiding the most aggressive exposures while at the same time being proactive in removing Metals from our bodies with the proper protocols that work and have been proven to work time and time again. 
(Medical Medium Heavy Metal Detox Cleanse and Smoothie) 

Learn more in Medical Medium Cleanse to Heal {link in profile}

#medicalmedium

node.title: TATOO INK HAS TOXIC HEAVY METALS

node.text:
Toxic Heavy Metals in our brain can short circuit us and make everyone sensitive to emotional and physical triggers.

Metals can make a blood sugar crash much more aggressive. The more Metals you have, the more intense hypoglycemia can be and we can become extra emotional.

Toxic Heavy Metals can cause Dyslexia, ADHD, Autism, learning disabilities and more. 

Neuroscience is far off the mark when it comes to chronic Illness and chronic mental health issues, oblivious to the role Toxic Heavy Metals play. 

College students are exposed to rodenticides, insecticides, fungicides, roach, worm and bug killers sprayed inside their dorm rooms and on and off campus housing. 
These are filled with Toxic Mercury, Copper, and Arsenic, and no one is aware of how bad the exposure is. 

Learn more in Cleanse to Heal {link in profile}

#medicalmedium

We become convinced into believing that we create all our problems, our depression, our anxiety and anything else we struggle from that can not be explained. 

Our emotional instability gets put on us and we are trained to believe we are the reason we feel like we do and that what we say and our actions are because we are being a difficult person. 

But there are real physical reasons to why we can’t seem to break the patterns and why we can easily become triggered back into a struggle.

Toxic Heavy Metals inside our brain are speaking for you in so many cases and Metals are not understood by the public medical industry. Toxic Heavy Metals can cause your depersonalization, bipolar, mania, unexplained sadness, anxiety, OCD, depression, and so much more.  It is not who you are, you are not those ailments, symptoms, and conditions. 

You are more than those labels, and your true self is who your soul is and deep down inside your struggle is not your fault, you are a good person and it’s critical you know this. 
 
There is a real true cause of what your going through, be good to yourself and validate your soul and body and have compassion for yourself and how strong you really truly are.

Learn more in Cleanse To Heal

#medicalmedium

While in high school, I had 8-10 lung infections, heart infection at 22, severe neuropathy in both feet at 24, mercury poisoning and hormone issues at 27, at 29 I finally got diagnosed with “LYME Disease”. 

I trusted my functional medicine doctor’s advice and followed an antibiotics regiment for 8 months.  This involved being BOMBED with 1500mg every day, dry heaving daily, even peeing on myself from being so weak, and I just couldn’t do it anymore. 

Then, from the ages of 30-32, I struggled for answers. I was willing to do whatever it took to regain my health and live my life again. 

One decision was going to China with my father in hopes for receiving some answers from Chinese medicine doctors. 

When that didn’t suffice, I made my next move - definitely the MOST drastic and taxing for my body - at 33, I traveled to a clinic in Germany, known for their extremely risky Hail Mary treatment. It’s a hyperthermia treatment where they put you under anesthesia twice for 6 hours, all the while, heating your whole body to 106.8-107 degrees Fahrenheit.  While under, they are concurrently pumping you with more antibiotics. It is so risky, in fact, that at 107.1/2 degrees Fahrenheit, it’s stated that there are serious and legitimate risks of brain failure. 

So, I got fried in Germany and I came back absolutely destroyed - in fact, most of us did. After that procedure, I wasn’t able to stand up at all, not even to shower, or cut a stalk of celery at the sink.  If you were to put a gun to my head and told me to stand up for 5-10 min, you would have shot me. That is how bad it was and how completely wrecked my body had become. 

I struggled on for 11 more months before finding @medicalmedium in Dec of 2019, I began to devoutly follow MM protocol(food and supps). When Cleanse to Heal came out with the advanced version of the 369 and explicitly stated that back to backing rounds was ok, I went right for it.

Life is not a play, there are no rehearsals, you get one shot.

node.text:
CHAMOMILE TURMERIC GINGER TEA🧡

Love the soothing effects of chamomile tea? Try this fun twist on regular chamomile with the addition of fresh ginger and turmeric, which offers even greater soothing and anti-inflammatory benefits than chamomile alone. Enjoy this tea anytime you feel stressed or in need of calming comfort.

Chamomile tea is beneficial for insomnia, sleep disturbances, racing mind, high anxiety and stress. Chamomile tea also has the ability to soothe a disturbed digestive system by easing flatulence, stomach aches, ulcers, and cramping and by assisting in overall digestion and elimination. It is also known to help relieve bronchial and sinus congestion, calm anxiety and panic attacks, decrease menstrual cramping, ease muscle spasms, and reduce migraine pain. 

Ginger also contains potent anti-inflammatory compounds called gingerols and is a powerful painkiller, which makes it especially beneficial for those who suffer with joint, muscle, and nerve pain. Ginger has incredible immune-boosting and germ fighting abilities and has even been shown to help provide protection and relief from E.coli, Staph infections, and Candida albicans. 

Turmeric is a known blood purifier and helps to soothe respiratory ailments, improve liver function, support the circulatory system, regulate menstrual cycles, prevent cognitive diseases such as Alzheimer’s, and heal gastrointestinal disorders. Turmeric significantly decreases inflammation that is attributed to arthritis and other autoimmune disorders such as lupus, irritable bowel syndrome, fibromyalgia, and chronic fatigue syndrome. 

Chamomile Ginger Turmeric Tea 

Ingredients:

2 chamomile tea bags
1 1/2 cups water
3-4 slices of fresh ginger
3-4 slices of fresh turmeric
1/2 cup fresh orange juice
1-2 teaspoons raw honey

Directions:

Place the chamomile, water, ginger and turmeric in a small saucepan and place on high heat. Remove from heat as soon as it starts to boil. Let steep for 3-5 minutes (or as long as desired), then stir in the orange juice and raw honey. Pour through a fine-mesh sieve into serving mugs.

Serves 1-2

node.text:
KALE PESTO {DAIRY-FREE & GLUTEN-FREE}🌿

If you struggle to get enough raw leafy greens into your diet every day, this delicious pesto recipe is a great way to sneak more in. Enjoy it with vegetable crudités, add it to your nori rolls, or try it with the baked Potato Fries or Zucchini Tater Tots on the blog. This recipe is much lower in fat than traditional pesto, making it a much better choice for your liver and overall health.

If you’ve heard that raw kale is bad for thyroid health, it’s vitally important to know this is incorrect. Raw kale is actually beneficial for the thyroid. Kale is high in specific alkaloids that protect against viruses such as EBV. Its phytochemicals can enter the thyroid, killing off pockets of EBV that start to develop there during the virus’s early stages of occupying the gland. 

Parsley removes high levels of copper and aluminum, which feed EBV and in turn cause skin problems. Parsley also bolsters production of the thyroid hormone T3 by helping to feed and restore the thyroid.

Basil’s antiviral abilities come in part from phytochemical compounds that can enter into the thyroid and slow down EBV cells’ drilling action. Basil helps reduce nodules, cysts, and tumors.

Kale Pesto

Ingredients:

2 cups kale, stems removed and roughly chopped
1 cup parsley
1 cup basil
2 cloves of garlic, roughly chopped
1/3 cup walnuts
2 tbsp lemon juice
1/2 tsp sea salt (optional)
1/2 tsp freshly cracked black pepper (optional)
3-5 tbsp water

Served with:

1/2 English cucumber, cut into wedges
1 red bell pepper, cut into wedges
1 small romaine lettuce, separated into leaves
1 large tomato, sliced

Directions:

To make the pesto, combine the kale, parsley, basil, garlic, walnuts, lemon juice, sea salt and pepper in a food processor or blender and blend until you get a chunky pesto. While the motor is running, pour the water into the food processor until you reach the desired consistency. Taste and adjust seasoning. 

To serve, arrange cucumber wedges, bell pepper, romaine lettuce leaves and tomato slices on a platter with the pesto. 

Serves: 4 people

* For Fat-Free option try replacing the walnuts with dates

And probably many more symptoms I don’t even remember I had…

I gained so much from @medicalmedium

🥔energy

node.text:
HEALING BENEFITS OF PEARS🍐

While apples are the stuff of legend, their close relatives, pears, are considered ho-hum. People often associate pears with their bland canned form, or with rare caramelized desserts; beyond that, pears don’t factor into most people’s daily thoughts. In the back of our minds, we know they exist, and that’s about it. 

Same with the pancreas: We’re aware that we each have this gland, yet unless it develops an issue, we barely register that it’s there. Meanwhile, the pancreas takes much of the body’s stress. And sometimes we abuse the pancreas without even realizing it by eating a combination of fried foods, rich dishes, too much table sugar, or high-fat desserts. Heartbreak, letdown, betrayal, and other forms of broken trust, as well as fear of any kind, are also hard on the pancreas. For pancreas protection and stress assistance, we must turn to the pear. This neglected fruit helps rejuvenate this neglected and overtaxed gland, alleviating pancreatitis and helping to prevent pancreatic cancer. 

Pears are also amazing for other aspects of digestion. They act as an antispasmodic; help to soothe the linings of the stomach and intestinal tract; feed beneficial bacteria; starve and kill unproductive bacteria, parasites, and fungus; raise hydrochloric acid in the stomach; help prevent intestinal and stomach cancers; and reduce the bad acids produced by mucus and pathogens such as H. pylori. They also restore linings in the gut that have become damaged and calloused from bacteria. 

The little granules in a pear’s flesh are loaded with phytochemicals, trace minerals, and amino acids such as valine, histidine, threonine, and lysine. The trace minerals and amino acids combine and lock onto poisons in the body such as DDT, expelling them from your system. Trace mineral salts make pear juice high in electrolytes, which stabilizes blood sugar. Plus, pears are a great weight-loss food and heaven-sent for the liver, helping to cleanse and purify the organ and stop cirrhosis. Bring pears into your life, and you’ll see that they’re anything but boring. 

CONTINUED BELOW ⬇️⬇️⬇️

{excerpt from Life-Changing Foods 📖}
